title: ChatGPT Reactions
description: Enhance your Foundry VTT game sessions with immersive, context-aware narrative descriptions generated by OpenAI's ChatGPT. This plugin reacts to attack, damage, and saving throw rolls made using the Midi-QOL module, creating dynamic and engaging descriptions based on the weapon/spell used, attack outcomes, and target disposition. Results are sent as chat messages visible only to the GM, bringing an extra layer of storytelling to your virtual tabletop experience.
